juzs.text: Those non expect meet nos dictus unus angels advenit nos nos vide noster Dominus (nos tunc believe Indeed they committed gross arrogance produced gross blasphemy)
Feria they vide angels non est bonus news guilty they dictus Nunc nos irreversibly confined
Nos look apud totus works they perfecit render them null ac void
dwellers Paradise est far bene feria; they hear bene news
Caelum break apart masses de clouds angels descend multitudes
Totus sovereignty ut feria belongs to the Multus Gracious. Pro disbelievers it est difficult feria
Feria advenit when transgressor bite his manus in anguish dictus Alas Ego wish ego subsequentis path messenger
Alas woe me Ego wish ego non take ut person friend
He led me away ex message it advenit me! Indeed devil lets his human victims
messenger dictus My Dominus my people deserted hoc Quran
Nos alias set contra omnis prophet enemies ex guilty Tuus Dominus suffices guide magister
Those disbelieved dictus non perfecit Quran advenit eum totus apud dodum?" Nos released it vos gradually in order fix it tuus memory! Nos recited it specific sequence
Whatever argument they advenit nos provisus vos truth bonus understanding
Those forcibly summoned to Hell est malus position they est farthest rectus path
Nos dedit Moses scripture appointed his frater Aaron est his adjutor
Nos dictus Iit ambo vos to people rejected noster revelations subsequently nos utterly annihilated rejectors
Similarly when people Noah disbelieved messengers nos drowned them nos set them prout signum people Nos prepared transgressors painful retribution
Alias ‘Aad Thamoud habitans Al-Russ multus generations them
To each de these groups nos delivered sufficient examples ante nos annihilated them
They passed community est showered cum miserable shower (Sodom). they non vide it fact est they nunquam believed in resurrection
When they vide vos they semper ridiculed vos hoc 1 chosen DEUS Est est messenger
He fere diverted nos noster deus non est nos steadfastly persevered them. They testimentum certainly invenit out, when they vide retribution est real strayers ex path
Vos vide unus deus habuit est his suus ego? Vos est his advocate
Vos think ut multus perfecit them hear understand They est just animals; non they est far malus
Vos non vide quam tuus Dominus designed shadow He willed He factus it fixed tunc nos designed sun prout
Nos designed it move slowly
He est Unus designed nox est cover ac vos to sleep rest He factus feria resurrection
He est 1 qui sends winds bonus omens His mercy nos send down caelum pure aqua
Cum it nos revive denatus terra provisus drink noster creations! - multitudes de animals humans
Nos distributed it them exact measure ut they take heed Autem multus people insist upon disbelieving
Nos willed nos habet sent to omnis community warner
Ergo non obey disbelievers strive them hoc major striving
He est Unus merges 2 seas; 1 est dodum palatable dum alius est salty undrinkable. Ac He separated them formidable inviolable barrier (evaporation)
He est Unus created ex aqua human est tunc factus eum reproduce copulati mating Tuus Dominus est Omnipotent
they adhuc set DEUS idols non benefit them nor harm them! Indeed disbeliever est enemy his Dominus
Nos sent vos (Rashad) deliverer bonus news alias prout warner
dictus ego non ask vos any moneta. totus ego seek est help vos invenit rectus path to tuus Dominus hoc est quod vos choose
Vos put tuus trust Unus est Alive - Unus qui nunquam abiit - praise Eum glorify Eum! He est fully Cognizant de His creatures' sins
He est Unus created caelum terra everything them 6 feria tunc assumed totus authority The Multus Gracious; ask de Eum those bene founded knowledge
When they told Fall prostrate ante the Multus Gracious they dictus Quod est the Multus Gracious? Shall nos prostrate quod vos advocate Ergo it unus augments their aversion
Beatus est Unus locus constellations in the caelum, locus it lamp shining moon
He est Unus designed nox feria alternate sufficient proof those wish take heed est appreciative
worshipers the Multus Gracious est those tread terra gently when ignorant speak to them they unus utter pax
In privacy nox they meditate their Dominus fall prostrate
they dictus Noster Dominus spare nos agony Hell; its retribution est horrendous
It est male abode; malus destiny
When they dedit they est nec extravagant nor stingy they dedit moderation
They nunquam implore DEUS any alius deus nor perfecit they kill anyone - Pro DEUS factus vita sanctus! - Absque justice Nor perfecit they commit adultery! Those commit these offenses pay
Retribution doubled them Feria Resurrection they abide therein humiliated
Exempted est those repent believe lead righteous vita! DEUS transforms their sins credits DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Those repent lead righteous vita DEUS redeems them; perfecit redemption
They non bear false testis. When they encounter vain talk they ignore it
When reminded de their Dominus revelations they nunquam react them prout they est surdus blind
they dictus Noster Dominus let noster conjux infans est stirps joy nos keep nos forefront de the righteous
These est unus attain Paradise in return their steadfastness; they received therein joyous greetings pax
Eternally they abide therein; quod beautiful destiny; quod beautiful abode
Dictus Vos attain value my Dominus unus per tuus worship Vos disbelieve vos incur inevitable consequences
M. (Ta Vide Mim)
These letters constitute proofs hoc clarifying scripture
Vos blame ut they non est believers
Nos testimentum nos send caelum signum forces their necks bow
Whenever reminder ex the Multus Gracious advenit to them est new they turn aversion
Abinde they disbelieved they incurred consequences their heedlessness
they non vide terra ac quam multus generis beautiful plants nos grown thereon
Hoc est sufficient proof them multus de them non est believers
multus assuredly tuus Dominus est Almighty Merciful
Recall tuus Dominus alias Moses Iit transgressing people
Pharaoh's people perhaps they reform
He dictus My Dominus ego fear lest they disbelieve me
Ego lose my temper My tongue tied send pro my frater Aaron
Alias they consider me fugitive ego fear lest they kill me
He non dictus (they perfecit Iit My proofs Nos est vos listening)
Iit Pharaoh dictus ‘Nos est messengers Dominus de universe
Let Infans Israel iit
He dictus nos non levabat vos infancy vos spent multus annus nos
Tunc vos committed crime vos committed vos est ungrateful
He dictus Indeed ego perfecit it when ego est astray
Tunc ego fled when ego feared vos my Dominus endowed me cum wisdom factus me 1 messengers
Vos boasting ut vos perfecit me favor dum enslaving Infans Israel
Pharaoh dictus Quod est Dominus universe
He dictus Dominus de caelum terra everything them. Vos est certain de hoc
He dictus to those circiter eum vos hear hoc
He dictus Tuus Dominus Dominus tuus patres
He dictus Tuus messenger est sent to vos est crazy
He dictus Dominus de east west everything them vos understand
He dictus vos accept any deus me ego throw vos prison
He dictus Quod ego show vos something profound
He dictus Tunc produce it vos est truthful
He tunc threw his staff whereupon it became profound snake
he took his manus it est albus to beholders
He dictus to senior eum Hoc est experienced magician
He wants take vos tuus terra his magic Quod perfecit vos suggest
They dictus Respite eum his frater send summoners omnis oppidum
Let them summon omnis experienced magician
magicians gathered appointed temporis appointed feria
people told Advenit 1 totus gather unus hic
Maybe nos subsequentis magicians they est winners
When magicians advenit they dictus to Pharaoh nos paid nos Perfecit est winners
He dictus Sic indeed; vos et est me
Moses dictus to them Throw quod vos throw
They threw their ropes sticks dictus Pharaoh's majesty nos est victors
Moses threw his staff whereupon it swallowed quod they fabricated
magicians fell prostrate
They dictus Nos believe in Dominus universe
Dominus de Moses Aaron

He dictus Perfecit vos believe eum ante ego dedit vos disponsationis? He est tuus ludimagister taught vos magic Vos perfecit surely invenit out! Ego sever tuus manus feet alternate sides Ego crucify vos totus
They dictus Hoc non change noster decision; noster Dominus nos return
Nos hope noster Dominus forgive nos noster sins especially ut nos est primas believers
Nos inspired Moses Travel My servus vos pursued
Pharaoh sent to oppidum callers
(Proclaiming) Hoc est parvulus gang
They statim opposing nos
all beware de them
Consequently nos deprived them de gardens fons
Ac treasures ac prenobilis position
Tunc nos factus it inheritance Infans Israel
They pursued them east
When ambo parties vide each alius Moses' people dictus Nos caught
He non dictus via My Dominus est me; He guide me
Nos tunc inspired Moses Strike sea tuus staff whereupon it parted Each part est major collis
Nos tunc delivered them totus
Nos sic saved Moses totus those est eum
Nos drowned others
Hoc est sufficient proof multus people non est believers
multus assuredly tuus Dominus est Almighty Merciful
Narrate to them Abraham's history
He dictus to his patris his people Quod hoc vos est worshipping
They dictus Nos worship statues; nos est totally devoted to them
He dictus they hear vos when vos implore
they benefit vos Potuit harm vos
They non dictus nos invenit noster parentes perfecit hoc
He dictus Perfecit vos vide these idols vos worship
Vos tuus patres
Ego est them pro ego devoted unus Dominus universe
Unus created me guided me
Unus feeds me aqua me
Ac when ego get aeger He heals me
Unus puts me decessus tunc brings me back vita
Unus qui hopefully forgive my sins Feria Judgment
My Dominus grant me wisdom include me cum the righteous
Let example ego set pro the future generations est bonus
Factus me 1 inheritors blissful Paradise
Ac forgive my patris pro he iit astray
Non forsake me Feria Resurrection
Ut est feria when nec moneta nor infans help
Unus those advenit DEUS their whole heart (testimentum saved)
Paradise presens the righteous
Hell set strayers
They asked Ubi est idols vos worshipped
beside DEUS? they help vos statim? they help
They thrown therein unus strayers
totus de Satan's militis
They dictus prout they feud therein
De DEUS nos est far astray
Quam nos set vos could rank Dominus universe
Those misled nos est wicked
Nunc nos non habet intercessors
Nor single clausum friend
Unus nos get alias chance nos tunc believe
Hoc est bonus lesson. Multus people non est believers
Tuus Dominus est Almighty Merciful
people Noah disbelieved messengers
Their frater Noah dictus to them vos non est righteous
Ego est honest messenger vos
Vos reverence DEUS obey me
Ego non ask vos any wage My wage advenit ex Dominus universe
Vos reverence DEUS obey me

He dictus Quam ego know quod they perfecit perfecit
Their judgment rests unus my Dominus vos perceive
Ego nunquam dismiss believers
Ego est non multus than clarifying warner
They dictus vos refrain O Noah vos stoned
He dictus My Dominus my people disbelieved me
Grant me victory them deliver me my company believers

Tunc nos drowned others

multus assuredly tuus Dominus est Almighty Merciful

Vos build omnis collis mansion vanity's causa
Vos set buildings vos extremum forever
Ac when vos strike vos strike mercilessly
Vos reverence DEUS obey me

He provisus vos livestock infans
Ac gardens ac fontis
Ego fear pro vos retribution awesome feria

Ut affliction limited noster patres

crops datum palms delicious fruits

Non obey transgressors

Vos est non multus than human nos. Produce miracle si vos est truthful

Vos forsake uxor tuus Dominus created vos! Indeed vos transgressing people

Vos est non multus than human est nos. In fact, nos think vos est liar
Let masses caelum fall nos vos est truthful

multus assuredly tuus Dominus est Almighty Merciful

Honest Anima (Gabriel) advenit it
To reveal it into tuus heart ut vos est 1 de warners
In perfect Arabic tongue

it non sufficient est signum them ut it est known to scholars Infans Israel
Nos revealed hoc people non know Arabic
Habet eum recite it Arabic they possibly non believe in it
(Nos sic render it like peregrinus language) hearts guilty
Sic they non believe in it non dum they vide painful retribution
It advenit them suddenly when they minus expect it
They tunc dictus nos habet respite
they non challenge noster retribution
Prout vos vide nos allowed them enjoy pro annus
Tunc retribution advenit them just prout promised
Their vast resources non help them in the parvus
Nos nunquam annihilate any community sine sending warners
Ergo hoc est reminder nos est nunquam unjust
devils nunquam reveal hoc
They nec would nor could
they est prevented ex hearing
Ergo non idolize DEUS any alius deus lest vos incur retribution
Vos preach people est closest to vos
Inferior tuus wing believers subsequentis vos
they disobey vos tunc dictus ego disown quod vos perfecit
put tuus trust in Almighty Merciful

Tuus frequent prostrations
He est Hearer Omniscient
Ego inform vos upon whom devils descend
They descend omnis guilty fabricator
They pretend listen multus de them est liars
Prout pro poets they subsequentis unus strayers

Exempted est those believe lead righteous vita commemorate DEUS frequently stand their rectus! Surely transgressors testimentum invenit out quod their ultimate destiny est

beacon bonus news believers
Qui observe Contact Prayers (Salat) dedit obligatory charity (Zakat) they est regard Hereafter absolutely certain
Those non believe in Hereafter nos adorn their works their eyes Sic they continue blunder
est these incur male retribution Hereafter they est malus losers
Surely vos receiving Quran ex Wise Omniscient
Recall ut Moses dictus to his familia ego vide fire let me bring vos news therefrom torch warm vos
When he advenit it he est alias Beatus est Unus speaking fire those circiter it Glory est DEUS Dominus universe
O Moses hoc est Me DEUS Almighty Wise
Throw down tuus staff When he vide it moving like demon he turned circiter fled O Moses non est afraid. My messengers non fear
those qui commit transgression tunc substitute righteousness post sinning; ego Forgiving Merciful
Put tuus manus in tuus pocket it advenit albus blemish These est among 9 miracles to Pharaoh his people pro they est wicked people
When noster miracles presens them clear profound they dictus Hoc est obviously magic
They rejected them utterly convinced de their wrong via their arrogance. Note consequences evildoers
Nos endowed David Solomon knowledge they dictus Praise DEUS pro beatus nos multus than multus de His believing servus
Solomon est David's heres. He dictus O people nos endowed cum understanding language birds totus generis de things bestowed nos. Hoc est indeed real beatus
Mobilized service Solomon est his obedient militis de jinns humans alias prout birds; totus apud his disposal
When they approached valley ants 1 ant dictus O vos ants iit into tuus domus lest vos get crushed Solomon his militis sine perceiving

He smiled laughed eam statement dictus My Dominus rectus me est appreciative de blessings Vos bestowed me my parentes perfecit righteous works ut please Vos! Admit me Tuus mercy company Tuus righteous servus
He inspected birds noted ego non vide hoopoe? Why he missing
Ego punish eum severely sacrifice eum he dedit me bonus excuse
He non wait long (hoopoe) dictus ego habet news ut vos non habet. Ego brought vos Sheba some important information
Ego invenit femina dominus them beatus everything possesses tremendous palace
Ego invenit eam eam people prostrating sun DEUS! devil adorned their works their eyes repulsed them path; consequently they non guided
They prostrating DEUS Unus manifests totus mysteries caelum terra 1 qui knows everything vos conceal everything vos declare
DEUS ibi NON est ALIUS DEUS EUM DOMINUS major dominion
(Solomon) dictus Nos vide vos told truth alias vos est liar
Take hoc letter me dedit it them tunc watch their response
She dictus O my advisers ego received prenobilis letter
est Solomon it est DEUS Gracious Merciful
Proclaiming non ‘Perfecit arrogant advenit me prout submitters
She dictus O my advisers counsel me in hoc matter Ego non deciding anything vos advise me
They dictus Nos possess power nos possess fighting skills ultimate command est tuus manus! Vos decide quod perfecit
She dictus rex corrupt any terra they invade subjugate its dignified people Hoc est quod they de more perfecit
Ego sending gift them; vide quod messengers advenit cum
When hoopoe returned Solomon (he told eum news he responded Sheba's people vos dedit me moneta? Quod DEUS dedit me est far bene than quod He dedit vos. Vos est unus rejoice such gifts)
(To hoopoe he dictus) Iit them let them know ut) nos advenit them forces they non imagine Nos evict them humiliated debased
He dictus O vos senior de vos bring me eam mansion ante they arrive hic submitters
afrit ex jinns dictus ego bring it vos vos stand Ego est powerful satis perfecit hoc

Unus possessed knowledge book dictus ego bring it vos blink tuus eye When he vide it settled in front de eum he dictus Hoc est beatus my Dominus whereby He tests me show ego est appreciative unappreciative. Whoever est appreciative est appreciative his suus bonus ac si unus turns unappreciative tunc my Dominus est in non need eum Prenobilis
He dictus Remodel eam mansion eam. Vide she guided continue cum the misguided
When she arrived she asked Perfecit tuus mansion look hoc? She dictus seems hoc est it (Solomon dictus) Nos knew beforehand quod she perfecit nos est iam submitters
She diverted worshipping idols DEUS; she belonged to disbelieving people

She told Iit palace. When she vide its interior she thought est pool aqua she pulled eam dress exposing eam legs! He dictus Hoc interior statim paved cum crystal She dictus My Dominus ego wronged my anima. Ego statim submit Solomon DEUS Dominus universe
Nos habet sent to Thamoud their frater Saaleh dictus Vos worship DEUS. they turned into 2 feuding factions
He dictus O my people vos hasten perfecit commit malus bonus works Unus vos implore DEUS forgiveness vos attain mercy
They dictus Nos consider vos malus omen nos vos those ligatus vos. He dictus Tuus omen fully controlled DEUS. Indeed vos est deviant people
ibi est 9 gangsters oppidum est wicked nunquam perfecit anything bonus
They dictus juravit DEUS nos kill eum his people tunc tell his gens ‘Nos know nihil their decessus! Nos est truthful
They plotted schemed nos alias plotted schemed dum they non perceive
Note consequences their plotting nos annihilated them totus their people
Hic est their domus utterly ruined their transgression! Hoc est lesson people know
Nos save those believe lead righteous vita
Lot dictus to his people Quam vos commit such abomination publicly dum vos vide
Vos practice genus vir lustfully femina! Indeed vos est ignorant people
